mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Albert H. Small Declaration of Independence Collection (University of Virginia)
Baumann, I. W.
Magnus, Charles.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 13 x 18 cm. on sheet 28 x 44 cm. folded to 28 x 22 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A depiction of John Trumbull's painting of the signing of the Declaration of Independence.
Engraved letterhead, at top of p. [1] of folded sheet; p. [2]-[4] are blank.
According to H.T. Peters, America on stone, p. 269, Magnus was at 12 Frankfort Street from 1858 to 1865.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Copy 1: Albert H. Small Declaration of Independence Collection. Deposit of Albert H. Small, July 14, 2003.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Copy 2: 13 x 18 cm. on sheet 29 x 46 cm. folded to 28 x 23 cm. Hand colored. Albert H. Small Declaration of Independence Collection. Deposit of Albert H. Small, July 14, 2003.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States.--Declaration of Independence
Letterheads--Specimens.
Document signings--Pennsylvania--Philadelphia--1770-1780.
